title: New (and goodbye): Elvis  Depressedly – Disgraceland
content:
It’s with a heavy heart that CITR posts the new EP from Elvis Depressedly, (the side project of Matt from Coma Cinema), as it signals the end of the project and the band as a whole.

But what a way to bow out, three wistful tracks full of pain and redemption. At times it’s bitter and longing, at others bitter and hopeful, but always captivating and brokenly soulful. With tears falling from our eyes, we wish them the all the best.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
